response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your business operations and enhance your market position. Given its value to you, we are offering it at a special introductory price of $900,000. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a game-changing asset at a rate that reflects its true worth while also providing you with a substantial savings compared to its market value of $1,500,000. I look forward to discussing how this product can revolutionize your company's performance. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information.", "product_price": 900000}
